configuration.name: widget_034088155125063113
configuration.stem: For Mendel’s peas, yellow seed color (G) is dominant and green seed color (g) is recessive. Write and complete a Punnett square to model a cross between a heterozygous parent (Gg) and a recessive parent (gg).
configuration.teacherAnswer: Answers should include a Punnett square with the alleles G and g along one side and g and g along the other side. Two squares should be filled with the Gg and two with gg.
